All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Administrator
    Administrator class contains a constructor and contains a constructor
    AdministratorInventory
    Contains methods related to inventory and administrator
    AdministratorView
    The AdministratorView class provides a user interface for administrators in the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    AdministratorViewing
    Methods related to administrator and viewing users
    Appointment
    Appointment class containing all information and methods related to appointment
    AppointmentManager
    Manages all appointment objects
    AppointmentOutcome
    Stores info and contains methods related to the outcome of an appointment
    AppView
    The AppView class handles the user interface for the main application.
    Date
    Date class stores date and contains methods related to it Paramters - day, month, year
    Doctor
    Doctor class is a subclass of Staff class.
    DoctorAppointment
    Contain methods related to doctor and appointment
    DoctorAvailabilityDate
    Class that contains method relating to doctor and availability Contains a date and timeSlots which is an array that stores 1 if available or 0 if unavailable timeSlots has a size of 7 which is the number of slots per day
    DoctorAvailabilityManager
    Manager class for Doctor Availability
    DoctorMedicalRecord
    Class contain methods related to doctor and patient's medical record
    DoctorTimeSlot
    Class to hold availability of doctors
    DoctorView
    The DoctorView class provides an interface for doctors to interact with the Hospital Management System (HMS).
    Gender
    Enumeration of gender
    HMSApp
    Main class for the Hospital Management System (HMS) application.
    IAppointmentManager
    interface for appointment manager
    IDisplayMenu
    The IDisplayMenu interface defines a method that any implementing class must override to display a menu and handle user interactions.
    IDoctorAvailabilityManager
    Basic interface for Manager of doctor availability
    IMedicineManager
    Interface for medicine manager
    IReadCsv
    Interface for readCsv
    MainApp
    The main method that serves as the entry point for the application.
    MedicalRecord
    Stores medical record of particular patient and contain methods related to medical record
    Medicine
    The Medicine class represents a medicine with its different attributes
    MedicineManager
    The MedicineManager class manages all the Medicine in the Inventory
    Patient
    Patient class that is subclass to User class
    PatientAppointment
    Contains methods related to Patient class and appointment
    PatientView
    The PatientView class provides an interface for patients to interact with the Hospital Management System (HMS) This class allows patients to view and update medical records, set availability,
    Pharmacist
    Pharmacist class that is a sub class of Staff
    PharmacistView
    The PharmacistView class provides an interface for pharmacists to interact with the Hospital Management System (HMS) This class allows pharmacists to view appointment outcomes, Update prescription statuses, Manage inventory, Submit replenishment requests for medicine, Change their password
    ReadCsvMedicine
    Read a csv file containing medcine information and save its content into medcineManager
    ReadCsvPatient
    Read a csv file containing patient information and save its content into userManager
    ReadCsvStaff
    Read a csv file containing staff information and save its content into userManager
    ReplenishmentManager
    Manager class for Replenishment class
    ReplenishmentRequest
    The ReplenishmentRequest is a request to replenish a certain Medicine with a certain amount
    ReplenishmentStatus  
    RequestStatus
    Enumneration of the request status PENDING,ACCEPTED,REJECTED,COMPLETED
    Staff
    Staff class is a sub class of User class and stores an addiional salary attribute Staff refers to Doctor, Pharmacist and Doctor
    TimeSlotDate
    Inherits from Date class Contains some more specified methods for handling doctor availability as well as for sorting
    UpdatePasswordView
    The UpdatePasswordView class provides a user interface for updating a user's password.
    User
    User class is class that stores information of anyone that has an account in HMS
    UserManager
    Manager that stores and manage all users
    UserType
    Enumeration of PATIENT,DOCTOR,PHARMACIST,ADMINISTRATOR
